To add a keyboard shortcut, edit the file ~/.config/inkscape/keys/default.xml or create it if it doesn't exist. The complete file should like something like below (it may contain other keybindings). To bind PixelSnap to the shortcut *Shift-X*, add the 2 lines between the horizontal rules:

{{{
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<keys name="Inkscape default">
}}}
-------------------------
{{{
 <bind key="x" modifiers="Shift" action="bryhoyt.pixelsnap" display="true"/>
 <bind key="X" modifiers="Shift" action="bryhoyt.pixelsnap" />
}}}
-------------------------
{{{
</keys>
}}}
